attributes.action: The home office investigates false accusations of domistic violence
attributes.background: There are some many spouses tricking their partners to come to the UK and then to get permanent leave to remain in the UK they accuse their partners of domestic violence all they need to produce is a police log sheet to get permanent stay in the UK

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. We're not sure exactly what you would like the UK Government or Parliament to do.

Making a false allegation of a crime, including domestic violence, may already in some circumstances lead to a jail sentence - for example, if someone is found guilty of perverting the course of justice. In other cases, people who are accused of making false accusations may be prosecuted for wasting police time.
